-- | Hack2 contrib extra
--   
--   Extra middlewares and utilities for Hack2
@package hack2-contrib-extra
@version 2014.12.20

module Hack2.Contrib.Middleware.UTF8Body
utf8_body :: Middleware


-- | matching a list of regexp agains a path_info, if matched, consponding
--   app is used, otherwise, pass the env down to lower middleware
module Hack2.Contrib.Middleware.RegexpRouter
regexp_router :: [RoutePath] -> Middleware

module Hack2.Contrib.RequestExtra
media_type :: Env -> ByteString
media_type_params :: Env -> [(ByteString, ByteString)]
content_charset :: Env -> ByteString
inputs :: Env -> IO [(ByteString, ByteString)]
